long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Better Today is a day planner and organizer that lives in your browser. It has features like • personal goal tracker • habit tracker • daily journal • gratitude journal • smart decluttered todos • pomodoro timers for focussed work and so much more. 

Use it to manage your goals, todos, habits, journals and more to boost your productivity, mindfulness and overall happiness. 

Use Better Today to get your work and life organized by tracking your goals, todos, life, health and habits, all at one place. It helps you to go from being overwhelmed with your life to taking back mindful control of your day.

With Better Today you can:
• Plan, organizer and track your goals
Every day that is not spent on working towards your goal is not taking you closer to your goal. Use Better Today to create unlimited goals, create tasks to achieve those goals and see the progress of your goals as you complete the todos related to that goal.

• Turn moments to memories using the Memories journal
Keep track of all the important moments of today so that they become precious memories for tomorrow and remind you what an awesome life you already have.

• Express your gratitude in your private Gratitude journal
Use the private Gratitude journal to create unlimited entries. Research says that ability to notice the positive things in your life can be developed by reflecting on the good things in your life and expressing your gratitude to them.

• Capture your todos the moment they pop in your head using an easy to use todos system
Declutter your mind. Put all your tasks in the easy to use and always available todo system. For each item you can also log the time you have spent so that you have a clear idea of the efforts you spent on each task.

• Focus on one task at a time using the inbuilt Pomodoro timer
Stop being overwhelmed and focus on one task at a time using the Pomodoro Interval timer.

• Build lasting habits by tracking the things that are important to you
Whether you want to track your fitness, health, productivity or just develop another habit, customize the trackers to suit your needs.

• Monitor the trends of the items you are tracking
Look beyond the daily variations and focus on long term and short term trends of items you are tracking

• Analyze each day of your past with details of what you did on each day
Whenever you want to remember what you did on a certain day or just scan through your yesterdays… we have a beautiful screen to help you navigate your yesterdays.

• Stay organized on Android, iOS or through our web app
Use Better Today, wherever you are. Use it on both desktop and mobile browsers or on your Android and iPhones. If you spend time on laptops, checkout the new tab replacement plugin for your browser.

• Privacy first
You are always in control of your data. You can hide stuff or delete it permanently from the app. To securely store your information, we use Google's infrastructure and communicate only over https.

Let's start getting better, today!
